mapper.insert:
insert into case_api (id, `index`, case_id, api_id, header, body, query, rest, assertion, relation, controller) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.index}, #{item.caseId}, #{item.apiId}, #{item.header}, #{item.body}, #{item.query}, #{item.rest}, #{item.assertion}, #{item.relation}, #{item.controller})
mapper.select: select ca.id, ca.index, ca.case_id, ca.api_id, ca.header, ca.body, ca.query, ca.rest, ca.assertion, ca.relation, ca.controller, api.name as apiName, api.path as apiPath, api.method as apiMethod, api.protocol as apiProtocol, api.domain_sign as apiDomainSign from case_api ca left join api on api.id = ca.api_id where ca.case_id = #{caseId} order by ca.index
